A4.text: Frank Miller is the outlaw whom Kane sent to prison, and his gang—his younger brother Ben, Jack Colby, and Jim Pierce—wait at the station.

A5.text: Ben is Frank Miller's younger brother, Jack Colby, and Jim Pierce wait at the station.
